subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
Lotteries
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Cavaliers, who won the lottery in 2003 and 2011, will have the first overall pick in the June 27 draft. The Orlando Magic will have the No. 2 pick.
snippet: The Cleveland Cavaliers, who won the lottery in 2003 and 2011, will have the first overall pick in the June 27 draft. The Orlando Magic will have the No. 2 pick.
